metadata.title: RHSA-2024:0212: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 (python-django) security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid
development and a clean, pragmatic design. It focuses on automating as much
as possible and adhering to the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle.

Security Fix(es):

* Potential regular expression denial of service vulnerability in
EmailValidator/URLValidator (CVE-2023-36053)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: python-django: Potential regular expression denial of service vulnerability in EmailValidator/URLValidator

platform: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 for RHEL 9

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
python3-django is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
